items.sentence: Tom made no attempt to answer Mary\'s question.
Tom immigrated to Australia when he was thirty.
Tom is going to stay there as long as possible.
Tom is not as smart as he likes to think he is.
Tom is sitting on the sofa, reading a magazine.
Tom is someone I really enjoy hanging out with.
I\'ve learned to live with the pain in my back.
Put that knife down. You\'re making me nervous.
Tom jumped to his feet and ran out of the room.
Tom fell asleep on the bus and missed his stop.
Tom fell asleep on the couch while watching TV.
Tom felt very tired after sleeping for so long.
Tom filled the three glasses with orange juice.
Tom finally realized there was something wrong.
I haven\'t yet given Tom permission to do that.
I hear you\'ve all been pretty busy yourselves.
I heard Tom gave you his grandfather\'s violin.
I didn\'t know that you used to live in Boston.
I don\'t have any friends who can speak French.
I don\'t know whether Tom has a bicycle or not.
